title: Colonial villa with paddy field views - LIP 130
details: LIP-130 A stunning villa situated only 15 minutes inland from the Galle /Matara Ocean road, located in ‘Happy Valley’ an area popular with foreigners and surrounded by natural beauty and paddy fields. This spacious house comprises of 3 large bedrooms with en-site bathrooms, a large living area, a covered outdoor dining area and a fully equipped kitchen. The large well-maintained garden with an infinity pool enjoys uninterrupted views over the ever-tranquil paddy fields. The villa is connected to 3-phase electricity, mains water, and has a fresh water well. The property is currently rented out as a holiday villa and has a good rental track history, all furniture except for a few personal items are included in the sale.
